REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1977 reute u f BC-DOW-JONES-AND-CO-INC 04-08 0073

TEXT.TITLE: DOW JONES AND CO INC <DJ> 1ST QTR NET
TEXT.BODY:
Shr 69 cts vs 64 cts Net 66,719,000 vs 61,773,000 Rev 285.6 mln vs 259.7 mln NOTE: Earnings include after-tax gain of 29.4 mln dlrs, or 30 cts a share, versus after-tax gain of 31.4 mln dlrs, or 32 cts a share, for 1986 first quarter. Earnings per share reflects a 50 pct stock dividend in the form of a class B common stock distribution on June 30, 1986.
Reuter
